issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Titanium Studio download link broken for Linux version in web site. Please see attached screenshot for more details.

h5. Actual Links:  
http://titanium-studio.s3.amazonaws.com/latest/titanium.studio.linux.gtk.x86.zip
http://titanium-studio.s3.amazonaws.com/latest/titanium.studio.linux.gtk.x86_64.zip

h5. Expected URLs should be (?):
http://titanium-studio.s3.amazonaws.com/latest/titanium.linux.gtk.x86.zip
http://titanium-studio.s3.amazonaws.com/latest/titanium.linux.gtk.x86_64.zip
fields.summary: Titanium Studio download link broken for Linux version in web site

comments.body: This issue appears to be resolved now. Let me know if that is not the case.
